Uses of Package
arlut.csd.ganymede.common

Classes in arlut.csd.ganymede.common used by arlut.csd.ganymede.admin
CatTreeNode
          This class is a simple treeNode subclass with a Category data element.
ReturnVal
          This class provides a report on the status of the client's requested operation.
RMISSLClientListener
          This interface is used to receive notifications when an RMI SSL connection is formed on the Ganymede client.
scheduleHandle
          Handle object used to help manage background tasks registered in the Ganymede Server's GanymedeScheduler.
windowSizer
          This utility class handles saving and restoring window sizes for the Ganymede client, using the Java Preferences API that was introduced in Java 1.4.
 

Classes in arlut.csd.ganymede.common used by arlut.csd.ganymede.client
BaseDump
          This class is intended to serve as a stub to hold basic information about server side categories for the client to process locally.
CategoryDump
          This class is intended to serve as a stub to hold basic information about server side categories for the client to process locally.
CatTreeNode
          This class is a simple treeNode subclass with a Category data element.
ClientMessage
          Old-skool 'enumeration' interface for server-to-client messages.
DumpResult
          This class is a serializable transport object, used to transmit the results of a data dump query to the client.
FieldInfo
          This class is a serializable object used to return all the value information the client's containerPanel needs to render a specific field instance, including the current value held in this field and the current editability/visibility this field has with respect to the user's GanymedeSession..
FieldTemplate
          This class is a serializable object used to return all the static information the client's containerPanel needs to render a specific kind of field.
Invid
          
ObjectHandle
          This class is used to group information about objects.
PermMatrix
          Serializable permissions matrix object, used to handle permissions for a given user, admin, or role.
Query
          The Query class is used to submit query requests to the GANYMEDE server, both for complex database searches and for simple object listings.
QueryDataNode
           
QueryNode
          A QueryNode is a node in a serialized Query tree.
QueryResult
          This class is a serializable object-list result object, which conveys results from a query/list operation along with methods that can be used to extract the results out of the query/list.
ReturnVal
          This class provides a report on the status of the client's requested operation.
RMISSLClientListener
          This interface is used to receive notifications when an RMI SSL connection is formed on the Ganymede client.
SyncPrefEnum
          Enum of synchronization choices for a specific object type or field in the Ganymede server.
windowSizer
          This utility class handles saving and restoring window sizes for the Ganymede client, using the Java Preferences API that was introduced in Java 1.4.
 

Classes in arlut.csd.ganymede.common used by arlut.csd.ganymede.common
BaseListTransport
          This class is intended to provide a serializable object that can be used to bulk-dump a static description of the category and base structures on the server to the client.

          This class is intended to serve as a stub to hold basic information about server side categories for the client to process locally.
FieldBook
          A data structure which identifies a collection of invids and field identifiers which are to be used for some kind of external processing.
FieldOptionMatrix
          Serializable field option matrix object, used to handle field options for a SyncRunner.
FieldType
          Hackified enumeration of defined types for database fields in the Ganymede DBStore.
GanyPermissionsException
          This is a Ganymede-specific RemoteException subclass that can be thrown by the server if a method is called which can cause a reject due to permissions failure.
Invid
          
InvidAllocator
          This interface is used by the Invid class to provide an Invid when given a short type number and an int object number.
InvidSlot
          This (non-public) class is used in the InvidPool to softly reference Invids that we are storing for purposes of interning.
ObjectHandle
          This class is used to group information about objects.
PermEntry
          Serializable and immutable permissions entry object, used to store and transmit permissions for a specific DBObjectBase and DBObjectBaseField.
PermMatrix
          Serializable permissions matrix object, used to handle permissions for a given user, admin, or role.

          A QueryNode is a node in a serialized Query tree.
QueryResult
          This class is a serializable object-list result object, which conveys results from a query/list operation along with methods that can be used to extract the results out of the query/list.

          This is a Ganymede-specific RemoteException subclass that can be thrown by the server if a parse method is called with a string that does not match the parser's grammar.
GanyPermissionsException
          This is a Ganymede-specific RemoteException subclass that can be thrown by the server if a method is called which can cause a reject due to permissions failure.
Invid
          
NotLoggedInException
          This is a Ganymede-specific RemoteException subclass that can be thrown by the server if a method is called on a GanymedeSession after that session has terminated.
